While_Talk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>The day is half done. A winner will be
crowned before it is through...
Balloon_While_006: Isn't he at his limit yet?
Ready_Talk_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>Hey! It's you! Just in time for our fateful
rematch too!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>So? Are you ready for another <clr:0000>contest of<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>endurance<clr:ffff> here in the blistering heat of
the Gerudo Canyon?
Ready_Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>That's what I like to hear!<sp:0:4:0>Now, the rules are nigh identical, other
than that the contest starts at dawn
tomorrow and the cost is <clr:0000>150 rupees<clr:ffff>.
So? <sp:5:0:0>Haven't lost your nerve, have you?
Ready_Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS>Heh. There's that spark I like to see.
My blood's on fire once more!

This contest will burn you down to
nothing! Your vitality, just melting away!
You'd better get ready for that.
Once your resolve is set and you're
prepared to compete, say the word!
Ready_Talk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>All right! The sun is rising, and so is
the temperature!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Your goal is to withstand the heat until
the sun sinks behind the western horizon!
Now without further ado...<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>ENDURE!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Ready_Talk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I see. Come again if you decide you want
to give this a try. I'll be waiting here,
enduring until then!
Ready_Talk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hmm? <sp:5:1:0>Look at you, you're already low on
vitality! I said we'd put it all on the line,
but I'm not putting your life at stake.
Let's do our contest after you've
recovered your vitality. I'll be waiting
until then!
Ready_Talk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Will you test your endurance after all?
Compete with me in this fearsome
Gerudo Canyon heat?
Ready_Talk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Aha. <sp:5:1:0>There you are.


You're here to challenge me to yet
another contest of endurance, yes?
LinkWin_Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I never imagined that you'd beat me in the
heat, but you've really proven yourself.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>The spoils of your victory, as promised.
Winner takes all.
Ready_Talk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>So? Are your wallet and soul ready for
this contest of endurance?
Ready_Talk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sure. I'll explain as many times as
you need.

I am the man who withstands, after all.
He who endures...even this.
LinkWin_Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Looks like I need more training.
<sp:5:1:0>I must temper my body until it can
endure anything!
Perhaps I'll venture as far north as I can,
just to push myself to the brink.<sp:0:4:0>My training journey awaits. <sp:5:1:0>Farewell!
Leave_Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You've strayed too far from our arena!<sp:5:1:0>
Come back here!
While_Talk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>M...<sp:5:1:0>me, trembling from<sp:5:1:0> exhaustion?


N-no! I'm just tr...<sp:5:1:0>trembling with joy
b...because you're such a worthy
competitor...<sp:5:1:0>
Leave_Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>What's the matter?<sp:0:4:0>Did the might of my endurance scare
you into running away?<sp:0:4:0>Well, I'm afraid your instincts have earned
me a victory today.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Swallow your fear, temper your soul, and
come challenge me again! <sp:5:0:0>I, too, will be
relentless in my self-improvement!
While_Talk_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>It's...<sp:5:1:0>been a while since I...<sp:5:1:0>had to push
myself like this...

All the more reason...<sp:5:1:0>that I must win
this contest!
While_Talk_012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>You... <sp:5:1:0>Phew, you must be...<sp:5:1:0>just about
<sp:5:1:0>at your limit, <sp:5:1:0>right?

I...<sp:5:1:0>can still take<sp:5:1:0> the heat.<sp:5:1:0> Just watch me.<sp:5:1:0>
While_Talk_013:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>If...<sp:5:1:0>you're at your limit...<sp:5:1:0>you should just...
<sp:5:1:0>put those feet on the ground. <sp:5:1:0>Go on.
While_Talk_014:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Unconscious_01>The...<sp:5:1:0>end is in sight, but...<sp:5:1:0>my vision
is blurring...<sp:5:1:0>

Ugh...<sp:5:1:0> Must...<sp:5:1:0>endure...<sp:5:1:0>
Foul_Talk_000:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>You put on clothes!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


You forfeit! Contest over! Endurance
tests aren't for the clothed!
Foul_Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I told you at the outset that wearing
clothes would ruin the fun!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway... <sp:5:1:0>If you decide you want to take
this seriously, show a little remorse and
come challenge me again.
Foul_Talk_002:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>You put on clothes!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


I thought I told you at the start that
wearing clothes takes the fun out of it!

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well... <sp:5:1:0>I'll let it slide just once. Take those
off right away!
Foul_Talk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All right, be sure you don't make that
mistake again. With that, let the contest
of endurance resume!
Object_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'd like to note that this contest will take
place atop those stone pillars.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0901>The very pillars you've placed something
upon!<sp:5:0:0> I certainly hope you weren't going
to try anything underhanded!<sp:0:4:0>I'm going to take the liberty of clearing
that away.
Ground_Talk_000:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>Your feet touched the ground!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


And that means victory is mine!
Ground_Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Haha!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


What, did you climb down the stone pillar
because you couldn't take the heat?<sp:0:4:0>Then you have admitted defeat!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Strengthen your body, your mind, your
SOUL! Then come back and challenge me.
But be warned, I'll be doing the same!
Ready_Talk_0080:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Yet again, we will place our all on the line!
But this time, we each wager <clr:0000>150 rupees<clr:ffff>!
And the winner takes all!
Ready_Talk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Backing out now? You're kidding!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, very well.<sp:5:1:0> But talk to me again when
you're ready to put it all on the line!
While_Talk_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>I suffered a bitter defeat in our cold-
endurance contest.

But I've redoubled my efforts to withstand
the heat! In the end, I will be the one
standing sweaty and victorious!
Ready_Talk_0081:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>You've prepared <clr:0000>150 rupees<clr:ffff>, and you're
ready to fight me?
LinkLose_Talk_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>You're running low on vitality! Trying to
endure any longer would put your life at
risk. This contest is over!
While_Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't lose this contest...<sp:5:1:0> I'm going to
endure like I've never endured before!
Ready_Talk_0082:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Tomorrow, we will return to the top of
those pillars and remain there from
morning until night.
Ready_Talk_012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Haha!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Right! I'll take those <clr:0000>150 rupees<clr:ffff> now.
LinkLose_Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You dropped out earlier than I expected.
A little more grit would do you good!
While_Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I'll show you that even the most
sweltering heat is nothing to me!

So? Are you feeling faint yet?


Don't answer that.<sp:5:1:0> It doesn't matter how
you're faring. I must focus on myself.
Carelessness could spell defeat!
Ready_Talk_0083:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Can you take the sweltering desert heat
for an entire day? That's what this contest
intends to find out!
If you set foot on the ground or run so
low on vitality that I deem your life is at
stake, you lose immediately!
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Happy_00>And of course!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0001>Anyone can endure the heat with the
proper clothing. Takes all the fun out
of it! So we compete in our underpants!
Other than that, you can withstand the
heat however you like! <sp:5:0:0>So? Haven't lost
your nerve, have you?
Ready_Talk_013:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Wait a minute... <sp:5:1:0>You don't have
enough rupees!

<sp:3:0:2:0900>How do you intend to endure the heat
if you can't even endure parting with
<clr:0000>150 rupees<clr:ffff>?!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hmph. <sp:5:1:0>Talk to me again once you've
scrounged up enough to wager.
LinkLose_Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That may have been the best you can
muster, but it's nowhere near my limit.
While_Talk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I won't lose heart again. You better hope
you're heatproof!
Ready_Talk_014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There we are! I'll just hold on to that.


Our competition will begin tomorrow, just
before the sun is overhead!
LinkLose_Talk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I admit, I was impressed by your
conviction, but it's still not enough
to beat me.
While_Talk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm impressed that you're still standing.
This heat is no joke.

But this contest has only just begun.
Marvel at how I endure!
LinkLose_Talk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_00>That was a real battle of wills... <sp:5:1:0>A little
longer and I'd have reached my limit too.
While_Talk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can hardly believe anyone else could
endure heat like this.

When we first met, my expectations were
low, but look how far you've come!
But it's still not enough to beat me.
Ready_Talk_016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If it's details you want, it's details you
shall have!
LinkLose_Talk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Temper your body. Steel your will. And
then come challenge me again. I'll keep
tempering myself too!
While_Talk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>The heat's finally on...<sp:5:1:0>but it's still not
enough to make me waver! I haven't
lasted this long only to lose now.
While_Talk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This contest of endurance is not merely
a battle with you, but one with myself!

Watch as I conquer my limits and win this
contest all at once!
While_Talk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>We've finally passed the halfway mark.
So? Can you still endure?

I certainly can... These fearsome climes
are nothing to me...
